class hive.runner.local_simulation_runner.RunnerPayload[source]¶

Bases: tuple

Holds the simulation state, dispatcher and reports for the simulation run.

Parameters

  • s (SimulationState) – the simulation state

  • d (Dispatcher) – the dispatcher

  • r (Tuple[str, ...]) – any reports generated for a timestep

class hive.runner.local_simulation_runner.LocalSimulationRunner[source]¶

Bases: tuple

The local simulation runner.

Parameters

env (Environment) – The environment variables.

env¶
run(initial_simulation_state, initial_dispatcher, update_functions, reporter)[source]¶

steps through time, running a simulation, and producing a simulation result

Parameters

  • initial_simulation_state (SimulationState) – the simulation state before the day has begun

  • initial_dispatcher (Dispatcher) – the initialized dispatcher

  • update_functions (Tuple[SimulationUpdate, …]) – applied at the beginning of each time step to modify the sim

  • reporter (Reporter) – a class to report messages from the simulation

Return type

RunnerPayload

Returns

the final simulation state and dispatcher state

hive.runner.simulation_runner_ops module¶

hive.runner.simulation_runner_ops.step(simulation_state, dispatcher)[source]¶

Steps the simulation by one time step.

Parameters

  • simulation_state (SimulationState) – Simulation state at time t

  • dispatcher (Dispatcher) – Dispatcher at time t

Return type

Tuple[SimulationState, Dispatcher, Tuple[Instruction, …]]

Returns

simulation state, dispatcher at time t+1, instructions generated.
